trans-unit.source: Represents a 3x3 affine transformation matrix used for transformations in 2-D space.
trans-unit.target: 表示 3x3 仿射轉換矩陣，可用於 2-D 空間中的轉換。

trans-unit.source: A 3x3 matrix is used for transformations in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_2d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-2d-md.md)] x-y plane.
trans-unit.target: 3x3 矩陣用於中的轉換[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_2d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-2d-md.md)]x，y 平面。

trans-unit.source: Affine transformation matrices can be multiplied to form any number of linear transformations, such as rotation and skew (shear), followed by translation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以形成的線性轉換，例如旋轉及傾斜 （切變），後面接著轉譯任何數目乘上仿射轉換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An affine transformation matrix has its final column equal to (0, 0, 1), so only the members in the first two columns need to be specified.
trans-unit.target: 仿射轉換矩陣具有其最後一欄，等於 （0，0，1），因此只有前兩個資料行需要指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: Note that vectors are expressed as row-vectors, not column vectors.
trans-unit.target: 請注意向量會表示以資料列向量，非資料行的向量。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> is stored using row-major order and has the following structure:
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>使用列為主要順序儲存，且具有下列結構：

trans-unit.source: The members in the last row, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>, represent translation values.
trans-unit.target: 在最後一個資料列中，成員<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>，代表轉譯的值。

trans-unit.source: In methods and properties, the transformation matrix is usually specified as a vector with only six members, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 方法和屬性中的轉換矩陣通常會指定為只有六個成員，具有的向量，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>)

trans-unit.source: Although you can use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure directly to translate individual points, or with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform> to transform objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] also provides a set of classes that enable you to transform objects without working directly with matrices: <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.SkewTransform>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>結構直接轉譯個別點，或使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform>物件，轉換[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]也會提供一組可讓您轉換的物件，而不需要直接使用矩陣的類別：<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.SkewTransform>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 要在這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構之後加上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> structure to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 在這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構之後加上指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: This operation is the same as multiplying this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure by the parameter `matrix`.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會與此相同<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>參數結構`matrix`。

trans-unit.source: Matrix multiplication is not commutative, though, so this operation is not the same as multiplying the parameter `matrix` by this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure; that is, (this * `matrix`) is not the same as (`matrix` * this).
trans-unit.target: 矩陣乘法不是交換，不過，因此這項作業不是相同乘以參數`matrix`由此<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>結構; 也就是說，(這 * `matrix`) 不是相同 (`matrix` * 這)。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the two specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> structures have the same values.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構是否具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> stores its values as doubles.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>將其值儲存為雙精度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Double> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為值<xref:System.Double>上它，比較兩個執行算術運算時可能會遺失有效位數<xref:System.Double>邏輯上相等的結構可能會失敗。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何檢查兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>結構是否相等。

trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> structure is invertible.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構是否可以反轉。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> has an inverse; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 具有反轉則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> is invertible.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查是否<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>是否可反轉。

trans-unit.source: If it is invertible, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 如果是可反轉，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>反轉。

trans-unit.source: Gets an identity <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得單位 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: An identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 單位矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An identity matrix has a value of 1 in coefficients [1,1],[2,2],[3,3] and a value of 0 in the rest of the coefficients.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別矩陣係數 [1，1]，[2，2] [3，3] 中有值為 1 和 0 在其餘係數中的值。

trans-unit.source: This correlates to setting <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A> to 1 and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A> to 0.
trans-unit.target: 這與設定相互關聯<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A>設為 1 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>設為 0。

trans-unit.source: In an affine matrix, which is the implementation that [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>, structure, coefficients [3,1],[3,2],[3.3] are implied to always have the values 0,0,1 respectively.
trans-unit.target: 中仿射矩陣，也就是實作的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]用於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>，結構，係數 [3,1]，[3,2]，[3.3] 一定要有值 0,0,1 分別隱含。

trans-unit.source: For an identity matrix, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.ToString%2A> method returns the string "Identity" instead of the coefficients of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>.
trans-unit.target: 針對身分識別矩陣，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.ToString%2A>方法會傳回字串 「 識別 」 而不是係數的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A> matrix.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A>矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Inverts this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 反轉這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: If it is invertible, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 如果是可反轉，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>結構會被反轉。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> structure is not invertible.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構是不可以反轉的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> structure is an identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構是否為單位矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: An identity matrix has a value of 1 in coefficients [1,1],[2,2],[3,3] and a value of 0 in the rest of the coefficients.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別矩陣係數 [1，1]，[2，2] [3，3] 中有值為 1 和 0 在其餘係數中的值。

trans-unit.source: This correlates to setting <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A> to 1 and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A> to 0.
trans-unit.target: 這與設定相互關聯<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A>設為 1 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>設為 0。

trans-unit.source: In an affine matrix, which is the implementation that [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure, coefficients [3,1],[3,2],[3.3] are implied to always have the values 0,0,1 respectively.
trans-unit.target: 中仿射矩陣，也就是實作的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]用於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>結構，係數 [3,1]，[3,2]，[3.3] 一定要有值 0,0,1 分別隱含。

trans-unit.source: For an identity matrix, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.ToString%2A> method returns the string "Identity", instead of the coefficients of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>.
trans-unit.target: 針對身分識別矩陣，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.ToString%2A>方法會傳回字串"Identity"，而不是係數的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> stores its values as doubles.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>將其值儲存為雙精度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Double> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為值<xref:System.Double>上它，比較兩個執行算術運算時可能會遺失有效位數<xref:System.Double>邏輯上相等的結構可能會失敗。

trans-unit.target: 這項作業會乘以參數相同`matrix`由此<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>結構。

trans-unit.source: Matrix multiplication is not commutative, however, so this operation is not the same as multiplying this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure by the parameter `matrix`; that is, `matrix` * this is not the same as this * `matrix`.
trans-unit.target: 矩陣乘法不是交換，不過，因此這項作業不是與此相同<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>參數結構`matrix`; 也就是`matrix`* 這不是與此相同 * `matrix`。

trans-unit.source: In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important.
trans-unit.target: 在複合轉換中，個別轉換的順序很重要的。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一次旋轉，再調整，然後轉譯，您取得不同的結果非先轉換，再旋轉，然後調整。

trans-unit.source: One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 順序是很重要的其中一個原因是，完成像旋轉和縮放轉換，以根據座標系統的原點。

trans-unit.source: Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin.
trans-unit.target: 縮放的中心位於原點的物件產生不同的結果調整已移開原點的物件。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，旋轉的中心位於原點的物件所產生的旋轉已移開原點的物件不同的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to prepend a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> onto another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何在前面加上<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>拖曳至另一個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>。

trans-unit.target: 旋轉的角度。

trans-unit.target: 使這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構繞著原點旋轉指定的角度。

trans-unit.target: 這個矩陣的旋轉中心點 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point about which to rotate this matrix.
trans-unit.target: 這個矩陣的旋轉中心點 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Rotates this matrix about the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 繞著指定的點旋轉這個矩陣。

trans-unit.source: In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important.
trans-unit.target: 在複合轉換中，個別轉換的順序很重要的。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一次旋轉，再調整，然後轉譯，您取得不同的結果非先轉換，再旋轉，然後調整。

trans-unit.source: One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 順序是很重要的其中一個原因是，完成像旋轉和縮放轉換，以根據座標系統的原點。

trans-unit.source: Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin.
trans-unit.target: 縮放的中心位於原點的物件產生不同的結果調整已移開原點的物件。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，旋轉的中心位於原點的物件所產生的旋轉已移開原點的物件不同的結果。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何在前面加上要縮放比例<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>。

trans-unit.source: Changes this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> structure into an identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 結構變更為單位矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An identity matrix has a value of 1 in coefficients [1,1],[2,2],[3,3] and a value of 0 in the rest of the coefficients.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別矩陣係數 [1，1]，[2，2] [3，3] 中有值為 1 和 0 在其餘係數中的值。

trans-unit.source: This correlates to setting <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A> to 1 and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A> to 0.
trans-unit.target: 這與設定相互關聯<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A>設為 1 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>設為 0。

trans-unit.source: In an affine matrix, which is the implementation that [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure, coefficients [3,1],[3,2],[3.3] are implied to always have the values 0,0,1 respectively.
trans-unit.target: 中仿射矩陣，也就是實作的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]用於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>結構，係數 [3,1]，[3,2]，[3.3] 一定要有值 0,0,1 分別隱含。

trans-unit.source: For an identity matrix, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.ToString%2A> method returns the string "Identity", instead of the coefficients of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>.
trans-unit.target: 針對身分識別矩陣，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.ToString%2A>方法會傳回字串"Identity"，而不是係數的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>。

trans-unit.target: 縮放的中心位於原點的物件產生不同的結果調整已移開原點的物件。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，旋轉的中心位於原點的物件所產生的旋轉已移開原點的物件不同的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how prepend a translation onto a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何前面加上的轉換拖曳至<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>結構。
